title: How to improve your looks
description:
Watch The Full Thing Here : 
————————————————————
Ready to build a network of amazing women and high-status men?

Michael’s Men of Action is a one-on-one Master’s program that teaches men how to create elite 
social lives by becoming higher status.

Click this link to learn how you can have a High-Status lifestyle now:
https://m.moamentoring.com/podcast

Click here to join the Men of Action community and watch the High-Status Networking 101 course:
https://m.moamentoring.com/moa-community

Interested in joining the Men of Action sales team? Apply here:
https://www.moamentoring.com/jobs/sales

Men of Action has an affiliate program! Post pre-made content and get paid passively:
https://www.moamentoring.com/affiliate
————————————————————

Subscribe on Youtube: 
https://www.youtube.com/user/MichaelSartain

Listen on Apple Podcast: 
https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/the-michael-sartain-podcast/id1579791157

Listen on Spotify: 
https://open.spotify.com/show/2faAYwvDD9Bvkpwv6umlPO?si=8Q3ak9HnSlKjuChsTXr6YQ&dl_branch=1

#michael #michaelsartain #michael_sartain #michael_sartain_podcast

channel_info.title: Michael Sartain
channel_info.description:
🎙Host of The Michael Sartain Podcast 

🔥Teaching you how to build a network of desirable women and high-status men

👇 Click the "Men of Action" link below now to forge a high-status lifestyle and join the elites

transcription: {"text": "Can't change your eye color, I can't change your ethnicity, and I can't change your height. But you can change the shape of your skull based on your haircut and the beard you have. You can change the clarity of your skin. We skip teeth. Teeth, God, is so incredibly important. There's studies that show you're far more likely to buy a car or a house from an agent who has clean, straight teeth. Teeth are such an incredible sign of status because consider your ancestors. People who were sick, their teeth fell out quicker. That's the reason why. Straight teeth are just so incredibly important. And then the other thing is finding clothes that fit are more important than the brand name. Finding clothes that accentuate the shoulder to waist ratio. For men, women on average like 1.65 to one, meaning your shoulders are 65% wider than your waist. That's what women tend to like. And most importantly, change how you present yourself on social media. Show competency, relevancy, access to scarce resources.
